data.text:
And so the Selection Race approached. It seemed like Smart Falcon 
was participating in a 1600m race on turf, but……

Hauuu～…… wait, no good, no good. 
An Umadol should always smile and be cute and cheerful!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
But you know. If it happens this time too…… no! 
I've been doing my best during training, so I'm fine, I'm fine.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
It seemed like she was unable to clear 
her unease as the race started.
Yaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Smart Falcon pressed forward with great strength. 
However, the trainers around me showed no reaction.

Smart Falcon, huh…… every time, things just don't seem to click. 
Even though I know she's doing her best……
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer

data.text: Just like that trainer said, she didn't seem to do well at all……

Haaaa…… Haaaa…… Haaa…… 
Hauu～n……
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Out of 12 participants, 
Smart Falcon finished 10th.

Her results left something to be desired but, there seemed to be 
something about her strength and form. I didn't think she was an 
ordinary Uma Musume……

Ah, there you are! Oh geez～, I showed you something shameful. 
Falco's reflecting on that.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
But, but, Idols and Uma Musume, you could say seeing 
their growth is respectable, and makes you want 
to cheer them on…… isn't that right? Right!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Maybe it wasn't a matter of growth, but a matter of 
compatibility. With the way she ran, I couldn't help but think 
she was suited for dirt……
……as I thought, is that a no?
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
……you see, my last Selection Race was as bad as this 
one. Since I haven't been able to get results this 
whole time, nobody has even talked to me……
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
I know that I'm lacking in abilities. 
But, but you see…… I definitely want to become a top Umadol!!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Winning races and standing as the center in the 
biggest Live. But, to stand on that stage, as 
frustrating as it is, I can't do it solo……
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text: That's right, I need Trainer-san's…… I need your support!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
It's fine even if you just tell me how I should train! 
Please, lend me your strength!!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
In her every word, I could sense her determination 
for her dream. Since I was a trainer, I couldn't 
help but want to respond to that determination.

Ehh, really!? Is it really okay!? 
Howaa, I guess it doesn't hurt to ask, huh～……!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Alllright, I look forward to working with you! 
Don't hold back with the training, okay? Trainer-san!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
And so, setting aside whether I would become her 
trainer for now, the days of training in preparation 
for the next Selection Race began.
Huunnn…… nunununununu～～～～nnn☆☆
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Wow, that girl's crazy. She's doing leg curls with so much weight. 
……smiling while doing it is kinda scary though.
data.name: Uma Musume A

data.text:
Alllright! Falco's running up☆ 
Soryaryaryarya～n!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
……there were no problems with her slope running and strength 
training. Or rather, her power was way above average. However――

Haaa, haaa, haaa…… 
H-how's my time!?
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Haa～n…… depressing. 
I haven't improved at allll～……
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
As expected, when I let her run on the turf, 
her results aren't that great. It seemed like 
this was definitely a question of aptitude.

Kyaaaa, Suzuka-saaan!! 
Look over here～!
data.name: Uma Musume

data.text:
Um…… excuse me, I want to practice so 
I can get ready for tomorrow's race……
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Silence Suzuka had a troubled look on her face in front of the 
sudden cheers. She had already debuted and as an Uma Musume, had 
already gotten great results.

Now now～ You shouldn't intrude on her private life. 
That's the basics of being a fan, right!?
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
You see, Suzuka-chan is in the middle of recharging her 
sparkliness so she can shine on stage! As a fan you should look 
forward to that! Don't you think?
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
That's true…… 
Sorry for bothering you～!
data.name: Uma Musume

data.text:
Falcon-senpai, thank you. 
I wasn't sure what I should have done……
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Stop it with the Falco-senpai☆ At times like these, 
you should just properly ask them and they'll understand♪
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text: But, you probably know that better than I do……
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
……Anyways, you're going to be practicing, right? 
Falco will be cheering for you☆ Go ahead and get started♪
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text: ――So, I wonder why you're putting Falco on dirt!?
data.name: Smart Falcon

choices.text: I wanted to measure your time on dirt

data.text:
She was in a place that required power― in other words, dirt. 
I wanted to see if she was suited for it.

……Uuu～…… I understand! 
But…… but, don't get your hopes up too high, okay?
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text: ―Uryaryaryaryaryarya～!!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
As I expected…… no, it was more than I expected. Her speed while 
on the dirt was incomparable to when she was on turf―
Haa, haa, haa……
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
Now I was certain. Rather than on turf, she could display 
her true strength on dirt, where power was necessary.

But that made me wonder. If it was like this, 
her instructor should have already noticed this……
Uuu…… I knew you'd say that.
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
But…… but dirt is a no!! 
I don't want to～～!!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
It's no good if Falco doesn't win on turf. 
There's no point if I don't……! That's why―
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
……I have dance lessons, so I'm done for today! 
Thanks for the hard work～～～!!
data.name: Smart Falcon

data.text:
I watched as she went dashing off with amazing speed on the dirt. 
The reason she was so set on turf…… it seemed like there would be 
some hint there to help her grow.
